descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kristaps Porzingis sends James Harden's shot flying and tosses ahead to Tim Hardaway Jr. for the alley-oop slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KP dazzles with block and dime to ignite Mavs) 2021/12/08 ESHEET

videos.headline: KP dazzles with block and dime to ignite Mavs

videos.description: Luka Doncic shows off his vision with a no-look pass to set up Kristaps Porzingis' slam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Doncic tosses no-look dime to KP for slam) 2021/12/08 ESHEET

videos.headline: Doncic tosses no-look dime to KP for slam

videos.description: James Harden absorbs contact from Josh Green as he splashes in the 3-pointer.
videos.headline: Harden makes smooth 4-point play

videos.description: Luka Doncic hits a side-step 3 on LaMarcus Aldridge as the shot clock expires.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka can't stop smiling after beating the shot clock with a 3) 2021/12/08 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka can't stop smiling after beating the shot clock with a 3

videos.description: Nic Claxton sells the push from Luka Doncic to earn him his fifth technical foul of the season.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka gets T'd up for pushing Claxton) 2021/12/08 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka gets T'd up for pushing Claxton

videos.description: Luka Doncic displays his elite passing with a dime to Dorian Finney-Smith for the dunk.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Luka dishes stellar dime to set up Finney-Smith's slam) 2021/12/08 ESHEET

videos.headline: Luka dishes stellar dime to set up Finney-Smith's slam

videos.description: James Harden takes Luka Doncic to the rack for the bucket.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Harden blows by Doncic to pad Nets' late lead) 2021/12/08 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden blows by Doncic to pad Nets' late lead

videos.description: Tim Hardaway Jr. is off the mark with a long 3-pointer as the Mavs drop to the Nets.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Tim Hardaway Jr. misses late game-tying 3) 2021/12/08 ESHEET

videos.headline: Tim Hardaway Jr. misses late game-tying 3

videos.description: Kevin Durant drops 24 points and James Harden adds 23 to lift the Nets to a late win vs. the Mavericks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (KD & Harden combine for 47 to rally Nets past Mavs) 2021/12/08 ESHEET

videos.headline: KD & Harden combine for 47 to rally Nets past Mavs
